nodes.text: Loopin' Chewie is a board game released by Hasbro Inc. in September 2015. It is based on the board game Loopin' Louie.

Players control the levers of their respective barracks, in time to Chewbacca and the Millennium Falcon doing flying loops overhead, trying to stop it from knocking a Stormtrooper token off the barracks and into the channel. Each player has three tokens. The winning player is whoever has at least one token remaining.
